item.description:
The show time is 7:55. Let's meet in the lobby by the escalators at 7:30. For those of you new to the group....I wear a little badge to help you identify me.


The next movie meetup is to see the thriller "Mr. Brooks"

Starring: Kevin Costner, William Hurt, Demi Moore, Dane Cook, Marg Helgenberger

To see a trailer go to:

http://www.theressome...

After the movie, if members of the group are interested, we will go out for drinks and munchies to discuss the movie and socialize a bit.

Hope to see you there.
item.name: Mr. Brooks
